summary: This module supplies a collection of decorator utilities that integrate VizTracer tracing into user functions. It offers wrappers to automatically start and stop a VizTracer instance around a function call, optionally persisting the trace data, handling multiprocessing contexts, and providing mechanisms to exclude certain functions from tracing or to record sparse logs.
business_intent: Facilitate effortless performance profiling and execution visualization for Python applications by allowing developers to annotate functions with tracing decorators, thereby generating detailed execution traces without manual tracer management.
